md:
giải nghĩa từ "rounds" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Round (adjective)

* Meaning: Having a curved or circular shape.
* Vietnamese: Tròn, hình tròn.

Example sentence: The round table was perfect for our dinner party.

Related words: circle, curved, spherical.

Antonyms: square, angular, rectangular.

Round (noun)

* Meaning: A circular or curved shape.
* Vietnamese: Hình tròn, vòng tròn.

Example sentence: The round of the sun was visible in the morning sky.

Related words: circle, sphere, curve.

Antonyms: square, rectangle, triangle.

Round (verb)

* Meaning: To make something curved or circular in shape.
* Vietnamese: Làm tròn, uốn tròn.

Example sentence: She rounded the corners of the wooden box to make it safer.

Related words: curve, bend, shape.

Antonyms: straighten, flatten, square.

Round (preposition)

* Meaning: From one place to another and back again.
* Vietnamese: Từ nơi này đến nơi khác và quay lại.

Example sentence: We went round the city to see all the sights.

Related words: around, about, through.

Antonyms: to, from, straight.

Note: The preposition "round" is often used in British English, while in American English, "around" is more commonly used.
